refnamediv.refpurpose: Converts from RGB to HSV colorspace.

varlistentry.listitem: A RGB image (M x N x 3) in 0-1 range or a RGB colormap (M x 3) in 0-1 range
A HSV image (M x N x 3) in 0-1 range or a HSV colormap (M x 3) in 0-1 range

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: rgb2hsv(RGB) converts an RGB image or colormap to the HSV colorspace. The HSV model separates Hue (color) Saturation (ammount of color) and Value (intensity). It is much more useful for manipulation than the RGB space and also for segmenting images by color.
